summary: A martial arts instructor from the police force gets imprisoned after killing a man by accident. But when a vicious killer starts targeting martial arts masters, the instructor offers to help the police in return for his freedom.
cast: Donnie Yen|Baoqiang Wang|Charlie Yeung|Bing Bai|Alex Fong|Siu-Wong Fan|Xing Yu|David Chiang|Kang Yu|Steve Chan|Hoi Mang|Wai-Fai Wong|Bey Logan|Apple Chow|Andrew Lau|Peter Kam|Kirk Wong|Kwok-Ming Cheung|Siu-Hung Leung|Tat Chiu Lee|Soi Cheang|Siu-Ming Tsui|Cheung-Yan Yuen|Raymond Chow|Pan Pan Yeung|Tung Cho 'Joe' Cheung|Dion Lam|Kinson Tsang|Roy Szeto|Susan Chan|Chi-Kin Kwok|Bun Yuen|Bruce Law|Billy Chan|Hua Yan|Shatina Chen|Deep Ng|Rock Ji|Jessica Ka-Wai Wong|Man Kit Cheung|Enoch Chan|Teddy Chan|Koman Cheung|Wing-Cheung Cheung|Mei-Shing Chow|Sam Kai-Sen Huang|Raiden Integra|Yuk-Keung Kwok|Wai-Kai Law|Chia-Liang Liu|Wai-Nam So|Jan-To Tam|Chiu-Yau Tang|Man-Chun Wong|Man-Kei Yiu
title: Kung Fu Jungle
